mapper.select: select userinfo.id,userinfo.uid,usergame.tili,usergame.last_tili_send_time,userprop.* from userinfo,usergame,userprop where userinfo.uid =usergame.uid and userinfo.utoken=#{utoken} and userinfo.uid =userprop.uid

select select_gameover_task.*,userinfo.id,usergame.normal_max_record from userinfo,usergame,select_gameover_task where userinfo.utoken=#{utoken} and userinfo.uid=usergame.uid and select_gameover_task.uid=userinfo.uid
select userinfo.id,usergame.ugold,usergame.diamond,usergame.ucharge from userinfo,usergame where userinfo.uid =#{uid} and usergame.uid=#{uid}
select userinfo.id,userinfo.uid,usergame.normal_max_record,usergame.tili,usergame.last_tili_send_time from userinfo,usergame where userinfo.uid =usergame.uid and userinfo.utoken= #{utoken}
update usergame set ugold=ugold+#{gold} where usergame.uid =#{uid}
select usergame.last_tili_send_time,usergame.tili,select_gameover_task.* from usergame,select_gameover_task where usergame.uid =#{uid} and select_gameover_task.uid=#{uid}
